results.name: Numbers n such that 10^n + 3*R_n is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comment: Also numbers n such that (4*10^n-1)/3 is prime.
link: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 133...33.
